member.name: T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.MetadataViewImplementationAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the type used to implement a metadata view.

member.name: M:System.ComponentModel.Composition.MetadataViewImplementationAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, declaring the type that holds the implementation for the view.
member.param: A for the implementation of the MetadataView.

remarks.para: By default MetadataViews are generated using reflection emit. This attribute allows the developer to specify the type that implements the view rather than using a generated type.

member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.Composition.MetadataViewImplementationAttribute.ImplementationType
member.summary: Gets the type that is used to implement the view to which this attribute is attached.
member.value: A of the export that is be provided. The default value is which means that the type will be obtained by looking at the type on the member that this export is attached to.
